mcq.statement: What was Sir Syed Ahmad Khan's attitude towards the positive aspects brought by the British?

options.b: Accept the good things brought by the British

mcq.one_liner: Sir Syed Ahmad Khan believed Muslims should accept the **good things brought by the British**.
